content: I can’t believe anyone is buying into the posse comments. Look it up “Posse: A group of people who have a common characteristic, occupation, or purpose”. What the hell is racist or derogatory about that? Lebron is an absolute idiot sometimes. It’s irresponsible to play the race card when it clearly is not the issue, it takes away from the occasions where race really is the issue. Maybe LeBron should look up the word as he suggested to Phil Jackson. Lebron is just mad at the criticism that he wants special treatment. With the current political climate in the USA many issues are because of race, this CLEARLY isn’t one of them.
